alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 2:03PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery and north central Harris Counties through 230 PM CST... At 203 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spring, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Humble, Spring, Kingwood, The Woodlands, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Splashtown, Porter Heights, northwestern Bush Intercontinental Airport, Lake Houston, New Caney and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southeastern Texas.
